io.micronaut.http

Class FullHttpRequest<B>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.HttpMessageWrapper<B>
      • io.micronaut.http.HttpRequestWrapper<B>
        • io.micronaut.http.FullHttpRequest<B>
  • Type Parameters:
    B - The body type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeHolder, MutableAttributeHolder, HttpMessage<B>, HttpRequest<B>

    public class FullHttpRequest<B>
extends HttpRequestWrapper<B>
    A request wrapper with knowledge of the body argument.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
